TopicTitle: [v0.15 Stock] VTOL & High Powered Jet (In One)

Articles.Content:
Hey, this aircraft can be either a VTOL Aircraft or a high powered jet, its up to you. This plane will last for ages on the VTOL fuel if you wish to just cruise around and hover, and once the VTOL engines eject you have plenty of fuel and speed to get into a low orbit if you wish.

Both version of the plane are highly controlable and it has 2 sets of landing gear, one for VTOL and the other for the jet.

A cool feature that I found was cool about this design is that it will flare before landing so you can have one hell of a smooth landing 8)

**(Note: Make sure you have SAS engaged for the first few second on take-off)**
